
var viva = [4.672606,-74.057666];

var apiRoot = "http://api.vivareal.com/api/1.0";
var apiKey = "183d98b9-fc81-4ef1-b841-7432c610b36e";

// Parameters are the same as the one to the other listings endpoint
// except we also have:

[
  'lat',
  'long',
  'r',
  'cluster'
]


// http://api.vivareal.com/api/1.0/listings?apiKey=183d98b9-fc81-4ef1-b841-7432c610b36e&lat=4.672606&long=-74.057666&portal=VR_CO&r=1000&maxResults=250
//
// r is in meters, not kilometers
// maxResults max is 250, after that it will ignore you and set it to 10
